# etcdv2_role (Resource)

Manages an etcdv2 role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "etcdv2_role" "app_readonly" {
  name = "app_readonly"

  permissions = [
    {
      key_path = "/app/config"
      read     = true
      write    = false
    }
  ]
}

resource "etcdv2_role" "monitoring" {
  name = "monitoring"
  permissions = [
    {
      key_path = "/metrics"
      read     = true
      write    = false
    },
    {
      key_path = "/health"
      read     = true
      write    = false
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role.

### Optional

- `permissions` (Attributes List) List of permissions for the role. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--permissions))

<a id="nestedatt--permissions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `permissions`

Required:

- `key_path` (String) The key path for the permission.
- `read` (Boolean) Whether read access is granted.
- `write` (Boolean) Whether write access is granted.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import etcdv2_role.app_readonly app_readonly

terraform import etcdv2_role.monitoring monitoring
```
